Articles.Content:
Does this game eat up a lot of resources on for anyone else. My computer can normally run my 3 Eve clients just fine but struggles at times with 1 running of this game. Just curious i have the latest version

Edited October 1, 2012 by tke_quailman
It's a memory bug with the game. Already fixed in the 0.17.1 update.

my computer gets 0.2 frames per second on just the command module, 1 part.

i need to upgrade,anyone no where i can buy a calculator

It's a memory bug with the game. Already fixed in the 0.17.1 update.

Wait Nutt, is 0.17.1 out already, or are you in the Test Team?...

My computer used to be able to play the game fine until 0.15, Then when they added the new water effects, My performance dropped significantly. Now, I have to play on 800x600 resolution, in windowed mode, all settings turned to low, Just to get 20 fps...
There's some generalized weirdness going on with memory and other stuff. Be assured HarvesteR and Squad are hard at work finding the cause
